title: Chhandamtu lungngaihna Kalvari lam chu panin
lyrics:
Chhandamtu lungngaihna Kalvari lam chu panin,
Thlarau Thianghlim, aw, min hruai ang che;
Hmuh ka chak em e, Chhandamtu chu,
A hlinglukhum leh a tuarna chu.

Aw, a na em e, min tlanna chu,
A kut, a ke, a nakah hmelma hliam a tuar;
Ka tan kraws chungah a nun a pe.

Ni tinin ka ngaihtuah, Chhandamtu thihna hmun chu,
Rinin khawvel atang hian ka hmu;
Mi sualte karah chuan an khai kang,
"Ka tui a hal," Lal Isuan a ti.

Ngai rawh u, Chhandamtu lungngai leh thlaphang rum chuan,
"Ka Pathian, engah nge min kalsan?"
A tawngtai amah khengbettu tan,
Kraws chunga a thih danw lai pawh khan.

Aw Lalpa, an tana i thlaphanna Kalvari-
Ah min tin hruai la, inentir rawh;
Hria se an tana i tuarna chu,
Lal Isu, an fak lo thei lo'ng che.
